snippet.title: Zen Koi 2 - Teaser
snippet.description: Zen Koi 2 is a sequel mobile game of a Koi's ascension into a Dragon. Coming soon to iOS and Android devices in November 2017. Zen Koi 2 is a sequel to the mesmerising collection game Zen Koi that follows the Asian myth about Koi ascending into Dragons. Developed by LandShark Games, Zen Koi 2 is a free-to-play mobile game that offers an enhanced experience with new features built on the well-loved core gameplay of languid action and strategic collection. Featuring the new Dragon Realm and My Pond, you can now play with your ascended Dragon and decorate your own pond!
